question_experience: How much experience do you have?
question_resume: May I download a copy of your resume?
question_project: Do you have any other projects?
question_contact: How do I get in touch?
question_community: Do you contribute to the community in some way?
questions_helper: You can navigate by the question number, if you will.
resumes_description: I will try to present you with the downloadable resume corresponding to your language. If it is not available yet, it will be in English.
contacts_title: Please choose any of the options below
skills_description: I'll show you the skills I consider most important along with the experience time for each one. These skills were mainly developed with work experience.
skills_soft_skill_disclaimer: Experience omitted given the relativity to the environment of these skills.
articles_title: Once in a while I stop to write an article
articles_description: I really like the Medium platform, so I write there, I will show you the main articles along with the link to access them all.
askAI_description: Given the available data, the AI will try to answer your question the best it can

resume.name: Lucas Hang
resume.title: Backend Specialist
resume.summary: As a passionate software engineer, I bring a wealth of experience and a strong focus on continuous learning. With a successful track record in roles ranging from back end development  to Scrum Master, I possess excellent communication, responsibility, and leadership skills. My  expertise spans DevOps, CI/CD, project management and Data Analytics. I am driven to deliver resilient,  valuable, and secure software solutions as well with data insights. Ready to contribute my skills, collaborate with peers,  and drive success in software engineering endeavors.

experience.description: Acting as a backend specialist, my responsibilities range from Project Management, Code Development, Observability and Performance ensuring and Data Analytics integration to achieve meaningful insights. Working in the continuous improvement of products like: tractian.com (main website), academy.tractian.com (industrial courses platform), tractian.com/events (own events platform), careers.tractian.com (careers page), among others… Responsible for analytics integration and value return, strongly working with PostHog, HubSpot, SQL, and other data empowerment tools.
Acting as a Node.js backend developer, providing support to the projects Portal de Multas and Frota360 at Unidas.

Supported and improved two internal web systems in PHP with Postgres and AngularJS; Developed a desktop application using Electron for order control and printing; Expanded the logistics area with PHP and React Native solutions; Acted as a Scrum Master in the development of a new product for complete internal restaurant management using a modern stack with Typescript + Node + React.

projects.name: Entregas10
projects.description: Commercial project developed to the company DEV10. It's a whole project including Website, Server and App. A logistics product, modern and made to high scalability and availability using modern stack Node with Nest, AWS Cloud and AWS SQS to manage queues. Frontend built using Next v15+ focused on server actions. App built with react-native with offline-first approach and native integration with POS machines and realtime geolocation tracking.
